Package ca.thurn.jgail.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Agent
    An Agent is any entity capable of analyzing a given game state and selecting an action.
    AsynchronousAgent
    An Agent which searches for actions asynchronously.
    Copyable
    Represents anything that you can make a copy of.
    Evaluator
    An evaluation function.
    State
    Represents the game state of a given game.
    State.ActionIterator
    An iterator over the actions available from a state in an undefined order.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionScore
    Class which associates an action with a given heuristic score.
    ActionTree
    A class to track the number of visits to and rewards associated with given game tree nodes.
    AgentEvaluator
    An Evaluator which relies on an underlying Agent to perform evaluation.
    Main
    A helper class for running games & sets of games between multiple Agents.
    Player
    Constants representing different players in a game.
    State.ActionIteratorFromIterable
    Adapter class to convert an Iterable into an ActionIterator.
    WinLossEvaluator
    An Evaluator which solely evaluates a state based on whether or not the provided player has won the game at that state.
